original_text: Jesus said, ‘You should not think that I have come to destroy God's Law. Also, I have not come to destroy the messages that God's prophets wrote down. No, I have not come to destroy their words. I have come to make what they taught become true.
korean_text: 내가 율법이나 선지자를 폐하러 온 줄로 생각하지 말라 폐하러 온 것이 아니요 완전하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: You should not think that I have come to destroy God's Law
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 하나님의 율법을 폐하러 온 것으로 생각하지 말아야 한다

sentences.original_text: Also, I have not come to destroy the messages that God's prophets wrote down
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 내가 하나님의 선지자들이 기록한 메시지를 폐하러 온 것도 아니다

sentences.original_text: No, I have not come to destroy their words
sentences.korean_translation: 아니요, 내가 그들의 말씀을 폐하러 온 것이 아니다

sentences.original_text: I have come to make what they taught become true
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들이 가르친 것들을 참되게 하러 왔다
